item.title: 印度市场热点：银行股重回主导地位
数据中心加热的奥克兰冲浪公园获监管机构批准
item.description: 总部位于美国的冲浪公园开发商 Aventuur 公司获准在新西兰开发一个项目，该项目承诺全年都能享受到由附近数据中心的热量加热的海浪。【原文：US-based surf park developer Aventuur won approval to develop a New Zealand project promising year-round access to waves warmed by heat from a nearby data center.】

item.title: 利润缩水，韩国银行警告开发商债务风险
item.description: 韩国央行表示，韩国开发商的财务问题可能会恶化，因为他们开始承受市场低迷对其盈利造成的冲击，这是对继续给经济蒙上阴影的信贷风险发出的最新警告。【原文：Financial troubles at South Korean developers may worsen as they start to bear the brunt of a market slump that weighs on their earnings, the central bank said, issuing the latest warning over credit risks that continue to overshadow the economy.】

item.title: 汇丰银行上调韩国股票评级至增持，因未来将实现内存增长
item.description: 汇丰控股公司将韩国股票评级从 "中性 "上调至 "增持"，理由是存储器行业的增长机会和政府举措将提升估值。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc lifted Korean stocks to overweight from neutral, citing growth opportunities in the memory sector and government initiatives to boost valuations.】

item.title: 交易员称日本周五前干预日元汇率 "疯狂
item.description: 日元的下一个大痛点，也是日本采取干预措施的潜在导火索，可能会出现在周五美联储所青睐的美国通胀指标的读数上。【原文：The next big pain point for the yen — and a potential trigger for intervention from Japan — may emerge from a readout on the Federal Reserve’s favored US inflation gauge on Friday.】

item.title: 国营石油巨头墨西哥石油公司（Pemex）在千亿美元债务的压力下获得税收缓刑
item.description: 墨西哥允许墨西哥石油公司推迟缴纳月度税款，这是在政府努力使这家国有石油公司获得更稳固的财政基础时遇到的一个挫折。【原文：Mexico granted Petroleos Mexicanos a deferral of its monthly tax payment, a setback as the government tries to put the state-owned oil company on firmer financial footing.】

item.title: Man Group 基金预计中国市场将在政策推动下反弹
item.description: 全球最大的上市对冲基金公司 Man Group 的一位资产经理预计，7 月份的中国最高领导人会议将推出旨在刺激消费的措施，以重振中国低迷的股市。【原文：An asset manager at Man Group, the world’s biggest publicly traded hedge fund firm, expects that the July meeting of China’s top leaders will roll out measures aimed at boosting consumption to revive the country’s sluggish stock market.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。英伟达（Nvidia）股价反弹助推美股走高。印度央行对经济增长持乐观态度。大众汽车向电动汽车制造商 Rivian 伸出了援手。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. A rebound in Nvidia shares helped push US stocks higher. India’s central bank is upbeat about growth. And Volkswagen has thrown EV maker Rivian a lifeline. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 行业报告显示石油库存增加，石油止跌回升
item.description: 在一份行业报告显示美国原油库存在政府官方数据公布前小幅增加后，石油保持了跌势。【原文：Oil held a decline after an industry report signaled a small build in US crude inventories ahead of official government data.】

item.title: 300 亿美元保证金交易增加日本股市上涨风险
item.description: 日本股市从历史高位滑落引发了另一个重大风险：看涨的个人建立了自 2006 年以来最大的保证金买入头寸，他们可能不得不平仓。【原文：Japanese shares’ slide from record highs has spawned another major risk: bullish individuals have built up the biggest margin buying positions since 2006 that they may have to unwind.】

item.title: 由 Vista 支持的 Solera 寻求在首次公开募股中获得高达 130 亿美元的估值
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由 Vista Equity Partners 支持的汽车数据和软件服务提供商 Solera 计划在首次公开募股中寻求约 100 亿至 130 亿美元的估值。【原文：Vista Equity Partners-backed automotive data and software services provider Solera is set to seek a valuation of about $10 billion to $13 billion in its planned initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日本股市上涨，英伟达反弹提振美国股市：市场综述
item.description: 日本股市将追随科技公司的涨势，这股涨势提振了华尔街，英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Stocks in Japan are set to follow a rally in tech companies that boosted Wall Street, with Nvidia Corp. climbing roughly 7% after a $430 billion rout.】

item.title: 投资者警告：忽视 "人工智能革命 "将自取灭亡
item.description: 虽然最近芯片制造商英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）股价的大跌可能加剧了人们对人工智能泡沫的担忧，但投资者和资产管理公司仍对这项技术持普遍积极的看法，但也有一些注意事项。【原文：While a recent selloff in shares of chipmaker Nvidia Corp. may have fueled fears of an artificial intelligence bubble, investors and asset managers still take a broadly positive view of the technology — with some caveats.】

item.title: 法国主要政党在电视辩论中就经济和移民问题发生冲突
item.description: 法国三大政治团体的领导人在首次电视辩论中就退休、税收和移民等问题发生冲突，他们试图让选民相信，可以信任他们来管理欧洲第二大经济体。【原文：Leaders of France’s three biggest political groups clashed in their first televised debate on everything from retirement and taxes to immigration as they sought to convince voters that they can be trusted to run Europe’s second-biggest economy.】

item.title: 艾因霍恩的绿光公司在新诉讼中抨击 "宏观负责人
item.description: 大卫-艾因霍恩（David Einhorn）的绿光资本公司（Greenlight Capital Inc.【原文：David Einhorn’s Greenlight Capital Inc. escalated a legal battle with a former employee who claims he was head of macro trading at the firm, alleging James Fishback was actually a poor performer who resigned ahead of being fired.】

item.title: 亿万富翁乔-刘易斯的飞行员避免因内幕交易入狱
item.description: 英国亿万富翁乔-刘易斯（Joe Lewis）的一名私人飞行员因利用其老板传递的内部信息进行交易而免于牢狱之灾。【原文：A private pilot for UK billionaire Joe Lewis has avoided prison for trading on inside information passed on by his boss.】

item.title: 低成本连锁健身房 EoS 寻求私人资本资助发展
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group Inc.【原文：Bankers from Jefferies Financial Group Inc. have been sounding out investors about a deal to provide fresh capital to low-cost gym operator EoS Fitness Holdings LLC, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 陶布曼表示，大银行交易商将继续向精品店转移
item.description: PJT Partners Inc.创始人保罗-陶布曼（Paul Taubman）表示，随着小型投资银行的发展壮大，以及大客户将目光投向最大的银行之外，顶级交易员从传统的大公司流向精品投资银行的趋势可能会继续下去。【原文：The flow of top dealmakers from traditional bulge-bracket firms to boutique investment banks is likely to continue as smaller shops grow and large clients look beyond the largest banks, according to PJT Partners Inc. founder Paul Taubman.】

item.title: 克利夫-阿斯内斯称 AQR 的机器正在做出更多决策
item.description: AQR 资本管理公司联合创始人克利夫-阿斯内斯（Cliff Asness）表示，AQR 资本管理公司正在让机器在这家市值 1090 亿美元的量化巨头中发挥更大的作用。【原文：AQR Capital Management is letting machines play an even bigger role across the $109 billion quant powerhouse, says co-founder Cliff Asness.】

item.title: 债券交易员大胆押注美联储 3 月前减息 300 个基点
item.description: 美国利率期权市场的交易商们正在对美联储的加息路径下一个新的赌注：在未来九个月内削减高达 3 个百分点的利率。【原文：Traders in the US rates options market are embracing a nascent wager on the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate path: a whopping 3 percentage points worth of cuts in the next nine months.】

item.title: 日本与可持续发展挂钩债券的可行性测试迫在眉睫
item.description: 随着许多公司发行的与可持续发展挂钩的债券的评估日期日益临近，对日本企业在环保方面取得的进展的审查也在不断加强。【原文：Scrutiny of environmental progress at Japanese businesses is rising as assessment dates loom for sustainability-linked bonds that have been issued by many companies.】

item.title: 联邦快递大幅削减成本，年度盈利前景超出预期
item.description: 联邦快递公司（FedEx Corp. ）的全年利润展望高于华尔街预期，该公司正在采取一系列削减成本的措施，以提高利润率并应对低迷的需求环境。【原文：FedEx Corp. provided a full-year profit outlook above Wall Street’s expectations as the company takes on a slew of cost-cutting measures to increase margins and cope with a sluggish demand environment.】

item.title: 波多黎各公用事业公司债权人延长争取广泛还款的斗争
item.description: 波多黎各电力局债务的一些债券持有人和保险公司延长了一项合作协议，反对破产电力公司大幅削减债务的提议。【原文：A group of bondholders and insurers of Puerto Rico Electric Power Authority debt extended a cooperation agreement to oppose the bankrupt utility’s proposal to drastically reduce its obligations.】

item.title: Quantum Capital 据称将以 18 亿美元收购 Caerus 石油公司
item.description: 量子资本集团（Quantum Capital Group）已同意收购凯厄斯石油天然气公司（Caerus Oil and Gas），据熟悉此事的人士称，这笔交易对这家落基山能源勘探公司的估值为 18 亿美元，因为私募股权公司正在加大对油区的收购力度。【原文：Quantum Capital Group has agreed to buy Caerus Oil and Gas in a deal that values the Rocky Mountain energy explorer at $1.8 billion, people familiar with the matter said, as private equity firms ramp up buying in the oil patch.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会仍在权衡对冲基金新规的下一步诉讼措施
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会主席加里-根斯勒（Gary Gensler）表示，华尔街最高监管机构仍在评估下一步措施，试图迫使对冲基金和私募股权公司披露更多费用信息。【原文：Wall Street’s top regulator is still evaluating its next steps in trying to force hedge funds and private equity firms to disclose more about their fees, according to Securities and Exchange Commission Chair Gary Gensler.】

item.title: 博阿兹-温斯坦称拜登比特朗普更适合债券市场
item.description: 萨巴资本管理公司（Saba Capital Management）的博阿兹-温斯坦（Boaz Weinstein）在周二举行的彭博投资会议上表示，乔-拜登总统的连任比唐纳德-特朗普再次当选总统更有利于美国债券市场。【原文：President Joe Biden’s re-election would be better for the US bond market than a second Donald Trump presidency, Saba Capital Management’s Boaz Weinstein said during the Bloomberg Invest conference on Tuesday.】

item.title: 巴克莱称：美联储结束资产负债表缩减，资金市场将保持宽松
item.description: 据巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）称，美国资金市场将在今年晚些时候承受住美联储资产负债表放松计划的结束，而不会出现任何重大的焦虑迹象。【原文：US funding markets are set to withstand the end of the Federal Reserve’s balance-sheet unwind later this year without any major signs of angst, according to Barclays Plc.】

item.title: 药物试验软件制造商克拉里奥秘密申请上市
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，帮助制药商通过临床试验推进治疗的软件供应商 Clario 已秘密申请首次公开募股，目标估值超过 100 亿美元。【原文：Clario, a provider of software to help drugmakers advance treatments through clinical trials, has filed confidentially for an initial public offering and is targeting a valuation of more than $10 billion, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 国债基准交易继续流行— 除非波动性爆发
item.description: 基差交易，一种对冲基金用来从国债及其期货合约之间微小的价格差异中获利的策略，又回来了。除非流动性紧缩扰乱这些市场，否则这种交易可能会越来越受欢迎。【原文：The basis trade, a strategy hedge funds use to profit from small price discrepancies between Treasury bonds and their futures contracts, is back. And its popularity may grow unless a liquidity squeeze disrupts those markets.】

item.title: 阿波罗的齐托称银行风险交易是 "当下最热门的投资项目
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司 (Apollo Global Management Inc.) 信贷部门副首席投资官约翰-齐托 (John Zito) 说，为银行资产负债表风险投保是 "当下最热门的投资"，该公司对这种投资一直是有选择性的。【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc.’s John Zito, deputy chief investment officer for its credit arm, said insuring bank balance sheet risk is the “investment du jour” — and one that the firm has been selective about.】
